targets.expr: kube_pod_container_resource_requests{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", unit="core", resource="cpu", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}
kube_pod_container_resource_limits{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$pod", unit="core", resource="cpu", container=~"$container", unit="core"}
kube_pod_container_resource_requests{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory", unit="byte"}
kube_pod_container_resource_limits{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", resource="memory", unit="byte"}

sum by (container) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))
/

sum by (container) (increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="monitoring", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Number of active series being tracked by the WAL storage
Total number of samples appended to the storage

panels.description: shows the current WAL segment file that each remote write instance is currently reading from
panels.title: Current WAL watcher segment

panels.description: is the WAL segment file that Prometheus is currently writing new data to
panels.title: Current WAL segment

targets.expr:
max_over_time(prometheus_remote_storage_highest_timestamp_in_seconds{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", container="prometheus"}[$__rate_interval])
- ignoring(remote_name, url) group_right
max_over_time(prometheus_remote_storage_queue_highest_sent_timestamp_seconds{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="$job", pod=~"$pod", container="prometheus"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Prometheus Remote Write Desired Shards vs Max

panels.description: Total number of samples which failed on send to remote storage, non-recoverable errors.
panels.title: Remote Storage Samples failed

panels.description: Total number of exemplars which failed on send to remote storage but were retried because the send error was recoverable.
panels.title: Remote Storage Samples retried

panels.description: Total number of samples which were dropped after being read from the WAL before being sent via remote write, either via relabelling, due to being too old or unintentionally because of an unknown reference ID
panels.title: Remote Storage Samples dropped
Total number of samples sent to remote storage

panels.description: Total number of times enqueue has failed because a shards queue was full.
panels.title: Total enqueue retries

panels.description: The number of samples pending in the queues shards to be sent to the remote storage.
panels.title: Total number of samples pending

panels.description: he capacity of each shard of the queue used for parallel sending to the remote storage
panels.title: Shard Capacity

panels.description: The total number of bytes of data (not metadata) sent by the queue after compression. Note that when exemplars over remote write is enabled the exemplars included in a remote write request count towards this metric.
panels.title: Bytes Total

panels.description: The maximum number of samples to be sent, in a single request, to the remote storage. Note that, when sending of exemplars over remote write is enabled, exemplars count towards this limt.
panels.title: Max Samples per send

targets.expr: sum by (name, config) (prometheus_sd_discovered_targets{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", job="$job", pod=~"$pod"})

rate(prometheus_target_interval_length_seconds_sum{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus",  pod=~"$pod", job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])

/ 
rate(prometheus_target_interval_length_seconds_count{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus", pod=~"$pod",  job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])
topk(5, sum by(scrape_job) (rate(prometheus_target_sync_failed_total{env="$env", cluster="$cluster", container="prometheus",  pod=~"$pod", job="$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Total number of target sync failures
rate API http requests by code and handler

targets.expr: sum by(reason) (kube_pod_container_status_last_terminated_reason{job="kube-state-metrics", env="$env", cluster="$cluster", namespace="monitoring", container="$container", pod=~"$pod"})

panels.title: Pod Container Status Last Terminated Reason

targets.expr:
kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{job="kubelet", env="$env", cluster="$cluster", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim=~".*$job.*"}
/ kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{job="kubelet", env="$env", cluster="$cluster", namespace="monitoring", persistentvolumeclaim=~".*$job.*"}
